message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for sale, priced at $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. Since this is your first sale, I'd like to wait and see how the product performs with other buyers. I'll be keeping an eye on your sales record and might reconsider if the results are favorable.
